settings.cart_countdown_ended_message: We'll endeavour to hold your stock allocation for as long as possible.

meta.description: Camden is a fully featured B2B theme with easy to configure features including: Add single and multiple items by SKU, login protected catalogs, shopping lists, customer personalization, switchable grid/list view, persistent mini cart, contextual navigation, configurable tax display and an enhanced account area for your customers. This theme includes free support and updates.
